title: (x) "Clothing Company" eroded Arial Black - Skratch Punk {Angel}
content:
hello everyone...does anyone know this font? or do you think it's prehaps someone's own distress they added? super similar to arial black, but i can't seem to find the actual font anywhere...

thanks,  
rachel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110209170420im_/http:/typophile.com/files/erodedtext_6670.jpg)
author: rfranco

comments.content: thank so much! it's been driving me crazy...i must have skipped it on dafont.
I usually skip that whole website! :^D
